data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kurbatov, Sergey A., Cuccodoro, Giulio (2015): Revision of Neodeuterus Schaufuss and description of a new allied genus from Borneo (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Pselaphinae). Zootaxa 4006 (2): 374-382, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4006.2.8
